Azimuth.app.welcomebox: div( h3(HTML("Please upload a dataset to map to the human primary motorcortex reference")), "Upload a counts matrix from an scRNA-seq dataset of human motorcortex data in one of the following formats: hdf5, rds, h5ad, h5seurat. For testing, we also provide a demo dataset of 6,235 human primary motorcortex nuclei (SMART-seq v4) from the Allen Institute for Brain Science, which is loaded automatically with the 'Load demo dataset' button or available for download ", a("here", href="https://portal.brain-map.org/atlases-and-data/rnaseq/human-multiple-cortical-areas-smart-seq", target="_blank"), # open in new browser tab ".", width = 12 )
Azimuth.app.refdescriptor: This reference was generated from 10x Genomics v3 data and annotations available from the Allen Institute for Brain Science. Originally described in Bakken et al, bioRxiv 2020, this data was integrated across two individual donors. Annotations are provided at the level of class (e.g. GABAergic), subclass (e.g. L2/3 IT), cluster (e.g. Inh L1-2 VIP WNT4), and cross-species cluster (e.g. Sst_6).
